website_summaries.verdict: Best for large households, this 15-cup/mug holder is sturdy, functional, and simple.
pros: Steel-constructed, sturdy rack holds up to 15 cups/mugs, giving you more counter or storage space
Simple design doesn't overtake your other kitchen decor
Unique design gives this holder extra stability
Can be used to hold other items, like measuring cups
cons: Cups can't be hung from the bottom rungs by their handles due to proximity to counter
instead, place cups upside-down on these rungs

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Sturdy Coffee Mug Tree
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. It's perfect, and it holds 15 mugs. The rack is very stylish and sturdy, and it looks nice next to my coffee machine. I no longer have many messy mugs all over the cabinet counter. The product package is well packed. I recommend this mug tree to anyone who needs a stylish and sturdy coffee mug tree.
customer_reviews.author: James MP

customer_reviews.title: Holds large latte mugs!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this mug stand. Fast shipping. Item just as described. I bought this for my large latte mugs and was worried that they would be too big. They fit beautifully on middle and top row of stand without touching the bottom or rubbing together. The stand is also very stable even if the mugs are on one side. Just for reference, there are 2 styles of mugs here; one measures 3.5 inches high and about 5.5 inches wide and holds approximately 24 ounces, the other style is 3 inches high, 5-1/4 wide and holds about 18 ounces. This stand easily holds all 8 mugs. I would order this again!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Convenient way to organize mugs, and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for something to organize my copper mugs and coffee mugs and this works perfectly. It allowed me to clean out a cabinet shelf that I needed for other things, and it looks good on my kitchen counter. Very convenient too, and it keeps the copper mugs dry and less prone to tarnishing. I have 8 copper mugs and 5 coffee mugs, some pretty big, hanging upside down and they fit nicely together. I received this the day after I ordered it and it was packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Fry daddy

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable coffee rack that will get the job done
customer_reviews.text: Nice affordable coffee rack that will get the job done. I do wish it were a little higher so I could actually fit mugs on the bottom rack, I didn't realize I would have that issue until after I purchased. So basically only the top 2 tiers are usable unless you prob something under the rack which I was too nervous to do. I have mine displaying my Rae Dunn and it's really cute. Another complaint is it's actually hard to get a mug on and off without hitting or taking off other mugs. the hooks are too close together in my opinion. But for now it is okay and looks cute.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this mug tree. I use it in my coffee and tea bar for clients. It's super convenient and it's really cute. It's strong and sturdy and I've had no problems with it whatsoever. The shelving unit that I put it on was not big enough to put the mug tree on so I just ripped off the top layer which was super easy and it fits perfectly. So I essentially turned it into two teirs instead of three. I have seen the same Mug tree at Cost Plus World market in brown, white and black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this mug rack but was a tiny bit disappointed that I'm not able to use the top part. If there are mugs up there they get in the way of taking off the ones below them. I was still able to fit ten mugs on it which is fantastic and it looks really great on my counter. All in all I'm happy with it and it's nice and sturdy, no chance of it tipping or breaking. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Bunch of bent wire that does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I just counted and we have 14 mugs of varying sizes, mugs not cups, stored on this thing. It freed up needed cabinet space while making use of a lost corner of counter space. Does a good job, easy to get mugs on and off. strong and sturdy. You can pick the whole thing up loaded and move it without fear of it flexing or falling over. It may not be much more than a bunch of bent wire but it has been an item I have found no faults with. Having had it for months I know now that if I was looking for a mug rack for some reason I'd buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits mugs of all sizes!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We just moved from a TH to single family and although the kitchen is larger or cabinet space is less - so I tried this out and LOVE IT!!!!!! I was worried by some other reviews, not sure how they are hanging the mugs, but pictures speak for themselves. We have very large mugs and standard size and they all fit, perfectly!!!! Feel free to reach out if you don’t understand how to get them to fit - mug hanging 101 😉 Bottom line...BUY IT it’s amazing!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Morris

customer_reviews.title: It holds mugs very well
customer_reviews.text: There are things that make the life easier. Who knew that the mugs I had were so sad setting on the counter top...low in the kitchen....even lower then the single cup coffee maker which is setting on the pods storage box......Now they are off the cold counter....Some have climbed even near the peak of the holder and can see far into the reaches of the kitchen....
customer_reviews.author: Roy H.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase, sturdy "mug" tree!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to hold baby bottles. Also ordered Copco Non-Skid Cabinet Turntable, 9-Inch so that it would rotate on the counter. My daughter was skeptical, until I suggested that she use the tree for mittens, gloves and little boots once baby bottles are discarded. Using for baby bottles has been GREAT! They dry and drain perfectly, remain available, and take up less than 8 inches of counter space. Vendor delivered on time as promised. Also, unit is exceptionally well made and strong. Should last for many years to come. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: PA Resident

customer_reviews.title: Very stable mug tree
customer_reviews.text: This mug tree is wonderful! Our previous mug tree toppled over and broke my favorite mug, and I wish I had gotten this one to begin with because that never would have happened. It says (and shows) that you can store mugs upside down or by the handle, but we store them upside down because hanging them by the handle isn't effective for the bottom level. We have big mugs, so we're unable to use all of the hooks on the top level, but that's a minor matter since we're able to store twice as many mugs with this one than the one that toppled over. I'd highly recommend this to anybody looking for a way to store their mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: If you were to talk to my husband, he would say that I have WAY too many coffee mugs. What can I say? 1. I love coffee. 2. I require variety when it comes to the vessels from which I enjoy it! This Mug Tree is absolutely PERFECT! Straight out of the box, no assembly required; doesn't get much better than that! Fits perfectly on my chef's cart in the kitchen and creates a beautiful display of my collection.
customer_reviews.author: J_312

customer_reviews.title: I still like my mug tree
customer_reviews.text: This mug tree is heavy, stable and durable. There is only one problem - The top tier can be unstable for the mugs, if the mugs are placed upside down. The motion of closing a nearby cabinet door caused a cup on the top tier to fall off (and break). Now I am hanging the cups by the handles on the top tier. Then, I am unable to use the middle tier because there is not enough clearance. I can put two cups by the handles on each hook on the top tier. So overall I am not losing the capacity. I still like my mug tree, even with a minor design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Fitchard

customer_reviews.title: I was a little worried this would fall over, but no.
customer_reviews.text: I needed an easy to access place to access my coffee mugs to free up some space in the cupboards. This is a great option. It stores all of my mugs perfectly. I was a little worried from looking at the pictures that it was too skinny and might topple over. That was not the case. While it does have a small footprint, it hasn't even come close to leaning over or toppling. It is really sturdy, even when made top heay.
customer_reviews.author: S. McHaggis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mug tree
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mug tree to replace one that took up double the space. This mug tree fits under my cabinet with ease, taking up a small footprint of counter. I have It filled with Rae Dunn and copper mugs, it is very solid. There has not been any amount if instability. It is easily pulled forward in order to reach back hanging mugs. I will purchase a second one to use in my craft room for various tools. 100% satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: ap 110406

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect! Holds even large mugs securely
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this for mugs next to my coffee pot. It's perfect! Holds even large mugs securely. We started putting mason jars on it too. I might need another one for our jars (which we use as glasses) It holds the small jam jars and the medium size jars well. The largest are held but look a bit too much too me. The only thing I don't love is the lowest holders you can't hang the mug by the handle. It's too low. Note the picture shown. The lowest ones would have to be put upside down over the post. No biggie. Just an FYI. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Joy In Simplicity

customer_reviews.title: Larger than it appears in the picture. But that’s a good thing.
customer_reviews.text: Receive compliments from everyone that sees it. It is very sturdy and holds a lot of cups.
customer_reviews.author: boog

customer_reviews.title: i use mine for coffee tumblers and it works great
customer_reviews.text: i know this is "supposed" to be for like coffee mugs but i only have tumblers that i use for coffee and i have so many of them i ordered this to put next to my Keurig and it works great now i have a space for my millions of tumblers and they will be all in one spot and not everywhere in my cupboards and coutners
customer_reviews.author: Chief_Bird

customer_reviews.title: Awkward cup storage
customer_reviews.text: The wise Forest Gump once said, “life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you’re gonna get”. That metaphor can definitely be applied to Amazon orders. You can get an amazing thing or you can get a garbage product. This is a garbage product. It is awkward. Just can’t seem to get the cups to sit right. Sadly, I didn’t open it until this morning and I ordered it over a month ago. I can’t return it. All sorts of nope.
customer_reviews.author: Elynne84

customer_reviews.title: Beyond satisfied, great investment, well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this taller version rather than the shorter but wider one you see on Amazon if you have only a small area. Tall, sturdy, and slender enough that I placed this beauty just right underneath my cupboards. Will not tip over so you need not worry about hanging mugs evenly across the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Dee C.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and serves the purpose. Will recommend
customer_reviews.text: The mug/cup holder is well made. The base is firm and stable. Can hang the mugs by the handle or just place them invert. Holds on with out any wobble. Will recommend
customer_reviews.author: shivakumar janardhanan

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I will Not return this item but I do hate that I can’t use the bottom racks, the mugs are too big and would hit the counter top. I believe it good quality though. Maybe a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: S. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: Was annoyed when it arrived. Somehow inside the box, one prong had gotten bent until it was poking outside the box. Was tempted to send it back without even opening the thing. The bad prong bent back - just laid it on the floor and pressed down; everything else seems fine. Holds all our mugs on all 3 tiers. I put the mugs on the prongs rather than hang them. It's very stable. 4 stars instead of 5 because of the bent prong.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing things besides mugs!
customer_reviews.text: This mug-holder works GREAT for the purpose for which I ordered it - to organize paper tubes I use for proper 'bio-disposal' needs. It is JUST what I wanted (and was hard to find something to organize these tubes). Works GREAT (and looks kinda cute where I need it)... And the seller got it to me PDQ (pretty darn quick) - which was wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Adriene J. Egger

customer_reviews.title: No judgement
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful I didn’t not get it because of USPS delivered it to someone else and Amazon gave me credit for this item. So I can not give it a true rating.
customer_reviews.author: MONA

customer_reviews.title: The Mugstrocity
customer_reviews.text: Somehow mug trees are really hard to find in stores. The only one I could find was in a Walmart, and it was this tacky wooden one for about $30. I wanted something durable (metal), sleek, and could hold most of our mugs. Our cabinets were overflowing and could barely hold our plates and normal drinking cups--on top of the mugs we seem to have collected. It sits nicely in the center of the dining room table, displaying the collection of nerdy off-the wall-cups we've collected, which my boyfriend has teasingly called the mugstrocity. The name fits. There was no assembly and came in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Clockwork

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of cups!
customer_reviews.text: This mug holder holds a whole lot of cups which is perfect for me. The only drawback is that the bottom holders are so close to the bottom, the cups don't actually hang, they sit on the counter top. Also, since it holds so many cups, they are hard to get off the rack because they are so close together.
customer_reviews.author: Fluffy Granny

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it and it retired our old mug tree
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it and it retired our old mug tree. He really like the sturdiness and how many mugs it can hold in many directions. Well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Fu

customer_reviews.title: Have to hang them upside down
customer_reviews.text: I found all of the mugs would not fit if hung by the handles, but do if hung upside down as if for drying. Which would work, but I was using it as a display piece for my pottery mugs. It looked okay as it displayed the bottoms nicely, but seemed a little tippy that way which is not good in an art show booth. Would probably work fine in a kitchen display.
customer_reviews.author: Emily T. Busby

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed to bring stylish order to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to bring stylish order to my tiny apt. kitchen top-counter space! does not require any wall attachment or stick-em hooks; and constructed so it does NOT topple over...thnx reasonably priced, as well as attractive!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this tree. Sets right next to our coffee Bar So many cup holders. It's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jeannene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my office/clubhouse and holds plenty of mugs and looks very sleek. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Beckybrowneyes85

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Super sturdy! No issues!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby and I have so many mugs that the old mug tree just wasn't cutting it. The box was demolished upon delivery but the item was pristine.
customer_reviews.author: Diana L. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: ok, but design issue..
customer_reviews.text: This serves it's purpose, although the bottom row is not usable. If you put a coffee cup on it, it would just sit awkwardly on the counter... bit of a design flaw. Although it was cheap and does what we needed it to!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna

customer_reviews.title: Quality, good look and functionality!
customer_reviews.text: I am more than happy with this purchase, I bought two units to display my collection of shot glasses and little mugs I bring from my trips, and it worked exactly how I imagined! The best part is, that you can put a mug and a glass on the same hook, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Galina D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good and looks exactly like picture
customer_reviews.text: This mug organizer is really good, sturdy and stylish. i was able to hold 15 mugs and even more at times (since I can double up, if it is plastic/resusable/ceramic cups/glasses I am using) I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: bmhgem1

customer_reviews.title: small footprint for 15 mugs/glasses storage
customer_reviews.text: Product as advertised and the paint work is not bad. I could put 6 mugs with handles, 6 glasses and 3 stainless steel mugs (without handles). However, instead of hanging by the handle, I put my mugs/ glasses upside down instead so that dust doesn't gather inside. I just wish it did not use those (protective) styrofoam that breaks apart (bits and pieces) as I remove them and it stick to the produc like static.
customer_reviews.author: CuriousLin

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's very stable and not likely to fall over. I like that it holds a bunch of mugs. I was able to free up cupboard space which was amazing. I have mugs that are of all shapes and everything fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mug rack for attractive and sturdy storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, sturdy, functional mug rack. I have lots of mugs, and I often "overload" this rack and it never seems unstable. I loved it so much I bought another one for my daughter's new apartment! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Keck

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Cute addition to my kitchen. I own a good amount of mugs. I believe this can fit about 9 mugs comfortably without any issue, and these are basically your normal sized mugs, tinier mugs you could probably fit more. You just need to maneuver them the right way to fit them. It’s worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great Mug Rack!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a mug rack for a long time and could never find one. I saw this on Amazon and it looked to be just what I was looking for. I love that it holds regular sized mugs as well as over-sized mugs. It does take up a bigger space on my counter top than I expected but it holds all of my different sized mugs which is what I was really wanting. It seems to be well made and I would recommend this rack.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Great size. But the bottom rungs are hard to use
customer_reviews.text: I love how solid and sturdy this holder is. It fits my mugs perfectly. My only complaint is if you are wanting to use all 3 tiers of the rings you will have to put the stand some sort of a platform. Right now I just have it sitting on my counter and I can't use the very bottom rung because they would lay funny on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Reviews were right, this is great!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of the reviews and am very pleased to say that it is super sturdy. It does work best to put the smaller cups at the bottom and bigger ones up top. You will need to "play" with it for your coffee cups.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for mugs on counter
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t find a mug tree locally so I looked on line and did some research. I am extremely pleased with my tree it is exactly the right size to fit under the counter and looks good. I use it more my pretty English mugs. The hangers are perfect fit for the mugs. I place the mugs over the hangers - I don’t hang the mugs by their handles
customer_reviews.author: Della Reeves-Burckhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizer rack
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive and sturdy mug tree. It fit nicely under our standard height cabinets and it holds a lot of mugs! I bought it to display handmade pottery mugs and it is a wonderful display tree. The lower stems are too low for our mugs, but we use the lowest row to hold stemless champagne flutes which we use every evening. This organizer rack is handy for more than simply mugs!
customer_reviews.author: Katharine B. Keeble

customer_reviews.title: Sadly returning this Mug Tree :(
customer_reviews.text: This product is made well. And is as appears. But all my coffee mugs are too big. The bottom row is too close to the counter top to hold cups by the handles. And if you try to put my mugs on the top row as pictured in advertisement, they flop around. Not a great fit for my cups but would be great for lots of mugs that are standard coffee cup sizes. I will be returning this product.....sadly!!!
customer_reviews.author: ROBYN HOLDER

customer_reviews.title: A good looking cup tree for the counter
customer_reviews.text: I was told I had too many cups in my cabinet .. this was my solution! Was packaged well and arrived on time. It seems to be doing the trick as I haven't had any more complains about too many cups in the cupboard!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee mug holder. I was looking for something to free up space in my cabinet and found this. I have some mugs that are heavy, big, small and they all fit nicely and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Beskwsels

customer_reviews.title: they love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my parents, as they were running out of cabinet space for all the coffee mugs they own. It fits perfectly on their counter, but doesn't take up too much space! The only concern I'd say I have is that if you use all of the spaces provided, the end result is a somewhat cluttered look, but other than that, they love it!
customer_reviews.author: AnnaV

customer_reviews.title: coffee mug tree
customer_reviews.text: I love my new mug tree it is so pretty on my counter. Every space is filled. I saw it on a television show with Chipper & Joanna Gaines they had the largest one on a counter of a house they did. I have the medium one and it holds 15 cups. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Wendy NN

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about purchasing this because of the price. I thought it was a little expensive for a mug holder. It is very sturdy, great quality and honestly I am so happy that I did spend the money on this. It holds all of my coffee cups and looks great in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: teresa pestoni

customer_reviews.title: cute way to display pretty mugs!
customer_reviews.text: love this mug holder. comfortably fits 6-7 medium sized mugs. great quality and doubles as decor!
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stable even when fully stocked
customer_reviews.text: This mug tree holder fits easily under my kitchen cabinets yet holds all of my big coffee mugs with ease. It is perfect for showing all the coffee mugs I get when traveling. The only issue I have is that I wished it would swivel.
customer_reviews.author: C.Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Great way to store coffee cups within easy reach
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a way to corral all our coffee cups on the counter by the coffee pot. This mug tree is perfect. Sturdy and stable. Holds lots of cups and I now have more space in my cabinets and on my countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Howard

customer_reviews.title: Good Mug Tree Holder
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, and I only have two minor complaints. One, if you have mugs on the highest rack, you need to move the mugs on this rack slightly out of the way to put mugs on the middle rack, and to take mugs off the middle rack. My second minor complaint is that the mugs on the bottom rack touch the counter beneath them and rub against the counter. However, I love the fact this holds so many mugs, and it is extremely sturdy and we'll built. If it weren't for the two minor complaints listed above, I would give this product five stars.
customer_reviews.author: GuyinChi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Held A Lot
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for my coffee mugs and mason jars. It easily held the max of 15 cups, and I have a mix of small and really large mugs. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tania W.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a beautiful woman
customer_reviews.text: Just flipping fantastic ! What can I say ! My wife loves coffee you dumb jiggers!
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son & daughter-in-laws new house. She drinks coffee; he doesn't. So it's hers.
customer_reviews.author: MikeL

customer_reviews.title: Great mug holder
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for displaying my Christmas mugs. I could fit lots on with no fear of tipping. Very sturdy with flexibility in how to place the mugs.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy But Last Tier Needs To Be Taller
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a mug tree for awhile and totally loved this one. Looks well made and is sturdy. However, it needs more height, though, especially the last tier. I don't like hanging mugs by inverting it onto the "branches" of the mug tree. My smallest mug tests against the counter top if I hook it (by the handle) on the bottom tier. This makes the last tier unusable for me.
customer_reviews.author: StormeSixx

customer_reviews.title: Great mug rack
customer_reviews.text: Love that this rack holds 15 mugs in about the same space as my old rack that held 6!! Freed up so much cupboard space and looks great on my counter!! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sher44

customer_reviews.title: Great pick!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted gor our coffee bar! As in the pictures you can hang mugs different ways, it's sturdy, and I like the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great rack - fitting all our needs
customer_reviews.text: We all love this rack! I put it on top of a Lazy Susan, so we can rotate it and get our mug of choice. i was concerned about stability when I ordered this. That's not even an issue - no worries! Totally stable and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: If you're a true coffee lover, you need this !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I can fit fifteen coffee cups on it, and my counter doesn't look cluttered at all. I've been telling everyone about it. It's nice to keep my cabinets less overflowing, and to show off my favorite coffee cups.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Hoevker

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way u can put mugs upside down. But I have some latte mugs that are still too big for it. But one big enough would have to be giant so no fault of this mug tree it is very good size.
customer_reviews.author: Witts Mini's

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made mug holder
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mug holder that looks great, organizes coffee mugs to display them on the counter and extremely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: darrel mullis

customer_reviews.title: A great space saver!
customer_reviews.text: Solid, stable rack for holding all the different sizes of mugs I've collected through the years; and it looks great right beside the coffee maker. A great addition to my kitchen counter space organization.
customer_reviews.author: NLmom

customer_reviews.title: Holds lots of cups
customer_reviews.text: Works well love the way it looks on the counter
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, stylish, durable
customer_reviews.text: This mug tree was delivered already assembled and it fit most of my mugs (I have a lot)! I’m very pleased with my purchase and am so excited to free up my cabinet space! I will definitely recommend this to all my coffee drinking friends.
customer_reviews.author: RachiePants

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for good price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup rack. A sturdy metal holder that doesn't too over. Helped me to free up a lot of cabinet space. I have is on my cabinet with all colors of fiesta coffee cups. Great addition to decore, functional and space saver! A win win with also a reasonable price. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Bounds

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at size of product! Holds a lot of mugs, is sturdy and fits beautifully on the countertop. Room to spare for cupboards above, too!
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Durable and quality purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to display my small collection of destination Starbucks mugs. It works great and the cups fit nicely. Only drawback is the bottom tier of prongs are not high enough. Any cups placed on this tier will lay on the counter top.
customer_reviews.author: sydrod

customer_reviews.title: I need more coffee mugs!
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute and doesn’t take up a lot of room
customer_reviews.author: gigi c.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking for some sturdy stand to hold cups and glasses together and iam so happy to have found this product.. the built is strong and it doesn't fall down due to uneven distribution of cups or glasses..great for value and good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Aastha Roy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I collect mugs, and this "tree" holds them securely in an upside down position, not by the handles. This allows the mugs to be displayed and accommodates more than the average tree. I also really like the black metal finish, sturdy and a neutral background for my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Mugele

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this mug tree
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Holds 15 mugs, you just have to be a bit careful taking them on and off the tree so they don't bang together. Seems very sturdy. It actually fit under my kitchen cabinets and I still have enough room to put small tea cups on the top rungs. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good & affordable
customer_reviews.text: This looks great on our kitchen counter, displaying our Starbucks mug collection from cities we’ve visited. The bottom row is unusable unless you put it up on something, maybe a small Lazy Susan so you can rotate the rack as well?
customer_reviews.author: Bradley C. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of cabinet space and needed a quick easy way to store my mugs in a stylish way. This holder is great. It looks very nice and is exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Rocarmic

customer_reviews.title: Honestly kind of monstrous
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to rate this lower than 4 stars because I'm sure this works perfectly for some people. But for me, it was so large that it took over my little breakfast nook.
customer_reviews.author: KyraTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy cup holder
customer_reviews.text: This cup holder works perfectly for small spaces. Only downside is that, I f your cups are 10z size, you can only use 2of its 3 tiers.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Flashes, inc.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Good holder cups organizer.It makes them look neat and the materiel is sturdy. Good decoration to keep on the table for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Irina P.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friend that owns a coffee shop. Allows for her customers who purchase her mugs to write their names on their cups and leave at the shop. It looks great on the counter!
customer_reviews.author: MalteseMom72

customer_reviews.title: This mug tree is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Was impressed by how sturdy this mug tree is. As it is rather tall, I was afraid it might be tippy if not balanced. Not a problem. Seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Verburg

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy! Heavy Duty!
customer_reviews.text: We filled the entire tree with mugs. It is very sturdy. We did not hang the mugs by their handle. We hung them top down. This tree is very sturdy. The construction is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elizabeth Watts

customer_reviews.title: Mug Tree Holder
customer_reviews.text: Great design, sturdy, and holds my 16 mugs with adequate spacing among the cups. Even the lower mugs don't touch the counter.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy. Great price. The only thing is on the bottom row you can’t hang the mugs by the handle or they will touch the counter top. You must place them upside down. Which will work fine, but they will be turned different from the top mugs if you choose to hand them by the handle. I love that it holds more mugs than other mug holders. Overall great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: and this mug tree was the perfect solution to storing mugs we no longer had cabinet ...
customer_reviews.text: We eliminated overhead cabinets to improve the sight lines in our kitchen, and this mug tree was the perfect solution to storing mugs we no longer had cabinet space for. Looks great and functions perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced!
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize I had so many mugs. This rack is well balanced and allowed be to stack in a limited space. It also told me to get rid out those mugs that didn't fit (either that or buy another rack).
customer_reviews.author: JustinTymeShopper

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Study Storage Solution
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well manufactured. Some of our mugs are heavy, hand made pottery; and the rack is well designed with a wide and heavy enough base that it can handle the weight without compromising stability. There are 15 hooks, but be mindful that the bottom ones are too low to use for hanging mugs. So consider it something that can hold up to 10 mugs. The lower hooks do, however, work well as a place to dry bottles or thin bud vases. Overall an attractive, sturdy, and space-saving choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tree holds a lot of coffee cup memories
customer_reviews.text: I have cleared my counter of a lot of coffee mugs just waiting to be picked off the tree. Not all my coffee cups are the same. They are different styles and sizes. They just fit. Each coffee cup has a memory attached and it makes it easier from selecting from this tree. The only thing I did was to put a rotating/revolving plate underneath so everyone can choose their favorite coffee cup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and sturdy especially when compared to others on market. The reason not giving no a perfect score is that hooks are too low to put mugs on the bottom hooks...maybe expresso cups! Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: e ann burnett

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, very stable rack for coffee mugs that is perfect for our small coffee bar area. I was pleasantly surprised that the rack is balanced and doesn't tip even if all the mugs happen to be on one side. This is a great alternative to the old wall-mounted rack for mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it does what it say wonderful I would recommend this and buy it again
customer_reviews.author: sweet545

customer_reviews.title: Love my coffee tree ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love my coffee tree!! Great quality, very stunts & holds more cups than most!
customer_reviews.author: Dyancey

customer_reviews.title: I love this mug tree
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mug tree. My daughter has one and I loved it so I made the purchase. It holds several mugs. It makes my coffee area look fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Discover

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Versatile, as the cups fit multiple ways.
customer_reviews.author: Dave and Rhonda Bartow

customer_reviews.title: Stable , well made
customer_reviews.text: Super stable ! I only wish there were more space at bottom for mugs , but it’s so well made , I’m pretty happy with it !
customer_reviews.author: JennSun

customer_reviews.title: Holds the larger mugs that I use.
customer_reviews.text: It holds the mug with the opening facing down so they will not collect dust between uses.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Bean

customer_reviews.title: Good spacesaver
customer_reviews.text: Loved this as we have lots of cups. Doesn’t take much space, placed next to coffee maker and looks tidy and organized.
customer_reviews.author: Maritza M Dorante

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Love
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Love. Love. Love. Strong. Heavy duty. Holds our big heavy cups & mugs very nicely. It is perfect on our coffee bar. Holds lots of cups. Very pleased. Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

product_meta.title: Stylish Steel Mug Tree Holder Organizer Rack Stand (Black)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackLooking for a stylish, durable mug tree stand for your coffee mugs on the coffee table? Looking for a mug tree stand to store your messy mugs, cup, glass inside the cabinet? Looking for a mug tree stand can fit most standard size mug? This "Stylish Steel Mug Tree Holder Organizer Rack Stand" is your best choice. Coffee mugs showed on the images are for display purpose only and are not included in the package. This mug tree stand is patent pending.
feature_bullets: Constructed from durable steel. Incorporating "Simple is Best" concept into functional stylish design
Display or storage purpose for kitchen counter, coffee table, or cabinet storage
Holds up to 15 coffee mugs, tea mugs, cups, or glass
Hook length at 3-1/2" fits most standard mugs
Mug tree stand measures 7-1/2"(Dia.) x 15-3/4"(H) approximately
